Change Your World @IBM WoW '16
Creating a culture of Innovation
Learn More
October 24th-27th, 2016
09:00 AM EST
Mandalay Bay, Las Vegas
It's a WoW Thing!!
Want to learn new things and explore success stories and experiences of the wise? Then, IBM's World of Watson (WOW) is the right place for you and it is all set to roll out this October 24th, 2016 and continues till October 27th, 2016 at Mandalay Bay, Las Vegas. The event mainly features the experiences of dynamic innovators who act as one of the sources of industry transformation and the trending technologies which can help you revamp the world to an advanced version.
WOW offers you the most inspiring speaker sessions and lets you explore a brand new world of interactive demos on the modern technologies for Cognitive, Cloud, IoT, and BigData. You also get to listen and feel the beat of the music tides by the ultimate "Imagine Dragons". We, Miracle Software Systems, Inc., a silver sponsor for the event are making our presence at the venue to guide customers with the most latest trends.

What We Are!!
Miracle Software Systems, Inc., is a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, Michigan. With over 20 years of industry experience, Miracle and its team of 2000 employees have been helping numerous Fortune 1000 customers to achieve their business goals through technology.
An IBM Premier Business Partner, Miracle is a certified Watson partner that can help you with Thought Leadership around your Big Data, Information Management, Cognitive and IoT Initiatives. Our teams are dedicated to help you achieve goals and reduce costs through the use of technology.
